name: 基礎設計（一）
description: 本課程為基礎設計課程，由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，培養學生了解基本創作思考與設計流程的認識；了解造形形式原理與構成組織方法，以培養造形創作表現的基礎能力。
goals: Cultivate the basic concepts and literacy students need to have in design profession.
Improve students' judgment and aesthetic value in visual observation.
Enable students to have a wide range of relevant knowledge and comprehensive abilities of creating more ideal life by design.
Understand how design can potentially improve human life by incorporating the new technologies for the future.
syllabus:
本課程檢視設計表現形式的基本法則與元素，以獲得視覺語言的關鍵概念；例如設計的目的與流程、點線面；紋理、圖案、色彩；整體與重點；節奏與平衡、比例；完形法則；圖層、透明；框架、格線；階層、模組、圖表；時間與動態；規則與隨機。  
每隔幾個主題，學生將蒐集生活中對應的範例或創作對應的作品以作為作業。

Week01 9/27    設計的目的與流程Design Defined & Process  
Week02 10/4    點、線、面、形狀Point, Line, Plane, Shape      
Week03 10/11    國慶日補假Adjusted to holiday  
Week04 10/18    紋理、圖案、色彩Pattern & Texture, Color  
Week05 10/25    整體與重點Unity, Emphasis & Focal Point  
Week06 11/1    作業報告Assignment      
Week07 11/8    節奏與平衡、比例Rhythm & Balance, Scale/Porportion/Value      
Week08 11/15    完形法則Gestalt Principles  
Week09 11/22    圖層、透明Layers, Transparency      
Week10 11/29    作業報告Assignment      
Week11 12/6    框架、格線Framing, Grid      
Week12 12/13    階層、模組、圖表Hierarchy, Modularity, Diagram  
Week13 12/20    時間與動態Time & Motion      
Week14 12/27    規則與隨機Rules & Randomness      
Week15 1/3    作業報告Assignment      
Week161/10    期末檢討Final Review
